about_the_game:
Strike Team Delta is a 1-4 player online co-op zombie horror. Complete tasks and puzzles to restore the fate of humanity.

Don't forget to wishlist!

Are you good enough for the delta team?

  • Online Co-Op
    Play with up to 4 friends and you all must work together to retrieve the objective and survive.
  • Replayability
    In Strike Team Delta, each playthrough is different, with random spawns ensuring you have a different experience every time.

Weapon Customisation

Build your guns the way you want them!

Character Customisation

Choose what gear to wear into battle

Saving humanity

Not only is your goal to survive, but you will also need to retrieve the objective you have been sent to get

Immersive Gameplay

Strike Team Delta is powered by Unreal Engine 5 ensuring the highest quality graphics for the most immersive horror experience possible.

  • Modding Support
    It is one of the early plans to enable modding support for the community to build any epic mission they desire!
  • Player Progression
    You should see player progression to unlock attachments, player skins, and weapon skins soon
  • Procedural animations
    Procedural animations for reloads, firing, and grips are all coming very soon!
  • More Maps & Missions
    I will be adding a few more maps and missions to the base game before unleashing the modding community.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts many scenes of violence by guns against the undead and gore.

detailed_description:
Strike Team Delta is a 1-4 player online co-op zombie horror. Complete tasks and puzzles to restore the fate of humanity.

Don't forget to wishlist!

Are you good enough for the delta team?

  • Online Co-Op
    Play with up to 4 friends and you all must work together to retrieve the objective and survive.
  • Replayability
    In Strike Team Delta, each playthrough is different, with random spawns ensuring you have a different experience every time.

Weapon Customisation

Build your guns the way you want them!

Character Customisation

Choose what gear to wear into battle

Saving humanity

Not only is your goal to survive, but you will also need to retrieve the objective you have been sent to get

Immersive Gameplay

Strike Team Delta is powered by Unreal Engine 5 ensuring the highest quality graphics for the most immersive horror experience possible.

  • Modding Support
    It is one of the early plans to enable modding support for the community to build any epic mission they desire!
  • Player Progression
    You should see player progression to unlock attachments, player skins, and weapon skins soon
  • Procedural animations
    Procedural animations for reloads, firing, and grips are all coming very soon!
  • More Maps & Missions
    I will be adding a few more maps and missions to the base game before unleashing the modding community.
name: Strike Team Delta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 4100 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea 2060TI or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea 3060 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Strike Team Delta is a gripping first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle hordes of undead, team up with friends, and reclaim our world. Survival is in your hands.
